jarvis.analysis.phonon package¶

Submodules¶

jarvis.analysis.phonon.ir module¶

Modules for analyzing infrared intensities

jarvis.analysis.phonon.ir.ir_intensity(phonon_eigenvectors=[], phonon_eigenvalues=[], masses=[], born_charges=[])[source]¶
jarvis.analysis.phonon.ir.normalize_vecs(phonon_eigenvectors, masses)[source]¶

Return the eigenvectors after division of each component by sqrt(mass). Adapted from https://github.com/JMSkelton/Phonopy-Spectroscopy/
